nodes.text: Paeragosto City was a city on the main continent of the planet Batonn. When tackling the Batonn sector insurgency during the reign of the Galactic Empire, Arihnda Pryce had a plan to halt the progress of rebel insurgents near the city, involving a bomb. Thrawn disapproved of this plan due to safety concerns but as the city was not yet a military zone, he had no authority.
